item.text: Office workers and desk jockeys, lawyers, accountants, insurance agents, bank personnel, financial advisers, tax prepares, clerks, sales personnel, real estate agents and a variety of middle management all fall within the scope of this occupation.
Job Change Requirements A Knowledge (Art, Business, Civics, History, or Technology) or Technology Use Skill Modifier of +15 or greater.
Skills (2) Knowledge (Art, Business, Civics, History, or Technology), Presence, Speechcraft or Technology Use.
